title: Where do you go with the Dyson Crevice Tool? - Official Dyson Video
description: From baseboards to crown molding, Dyson tools are engineered for hard-to-reach places.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
From baseboards to crown molding, Dyson tools are engineered for hard-to-reach places 

http://www.youtube.com/dysonus
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson

transcripts: My favorite tool on the Dyson vacuum is the combination crevice tool I use it to clean crevices in my couch, I can also use it to get underneath the cabinetry in my kitchen. I'm a baseboard guy and a crown moldings guy cause we have higher ceilings. So I've been around the molding and it picks it up with ease. I can use this for my ceiling fans, I could use this for my couch fabric, I could use it for the car. I love the detachable brush that you can put in and just kind of go across the baseboards and it just picks everything up. My molding is clean, it's dust free and it's absolutely gorgeous. I like it enough that I'm that much more inclined to actually you know pick it up and use it. That makes her happy which is important right? Right.
